recommendations.text: AtoB offers a modern financial platform with state-of-the-art fuel and business spend cards, instant 24x7 payments, and working capital solutions.
AtoB helps fleets get paid instantly.
AtoB helps fleets reduce expenses by 15% or more.
AtoB helps fleets access the credit and working capital they need to scale.
AtoB provides Fuel Savings through the largest discount fuel network.
AtoB offers Working Capital to pay expenses over time.

AtoB helps maximize savings with Fuel Map, missed savings reports, and automated fraud detection.
AtoB offers a single, unified platform to manage fleet’s financial health, including A/R, profit tracking, payroll, and vendor payments.
AtoB offers truck diesel savings averaging 45¢ and up to $2.00 per gallon.
AtoB provides 99.9% card acceptance.
AtoB offers savings at over 30,000 gas stations.
AtoB offers savings at over 3,000 truck stops.

AtoB features the broadest network at truck stops and gas stations, including Exxon, Circle K, Maverik, TA Petro, AMBest, Mobil, Sheetz, Casey's, KwikTrip, Sunoco, 7fleet, RaceTrac, Sapp Bros, and Rutter's.
AtoB enables instant money transfers, utilizing up to 120 more payment days per year with different ways to receive instant payments from factors.
AtoB allows real-time spend management, including setting spend limits, creating automated alerts, and preventing fuel theft with telematics integrations.
AtoB provides IFTA reporting to automate mileage tracking and tax calculations, saving hours on paperwork.
AtoB offers insights, incentives, and control to manage fuel card assignment, motivate drivers to maximize discounts, and get insight into missed savings.
AtoB's partner program gives fleets access to fuel discounts, instant payments, and more, all under the partner's brand.
AtoB for Factors offers faster and better ways to pay.
AtoB for Brokers helps drive up customer retention.
AtoB transformed Equipment Transport’s fuel efficiency by providing access to a wider fuel network, resulting in $1,000 in annual savings per vehicle.
AtoB saved RB High Tech $80K+ in 8 months through its Discount Network, fraud prevention, and card misuse prevention, offering up to 90¢ per gallon discounts.
AtoB provides Stotland Trucking with better fuel management tools and access to fuel discounts, achieving 10% fuel and operational savings.
AtoB delivered an average of 54¢+ savings per gallon on fuel and streamlined operations for Sweatman Trucking.
AtoB makes it virtually impossible to steal, providing the fraud prevention that Matthew Johnston (AJL International) had been looking for.
AtoB offers industry-leading 24/7 customer service and support via phone (+1 (833) 947-2862) and email (support@atob.com).
AtoB cards are accepted at 99%+ of gas stations and truck stops for widespread fuel and non-fuel acceptance (maintenance, tolls, tires, etc.), with customizable rules and restrictions.
AtoB can port existing discounts at any merchant already in AtoB's partner network (excluding Pilot Flying J currently).
AtoB offers a fraud prevention guarantee up to $250,000, with cards locked by default, telematics integration for GPS validation, and dynamic authorization.

AtoB provides detailed transaction reporting (merchant, purchase, telematics, pricing data), downloadable reports, summarized insights, and IFTA-eligible transaction reports with telematics integration.
AtoB cards prevent fraud on non-fuel spending through spend controls and merchant category restrictions managed by fleet admins, adjustable on the fly.

AtoB offers both credit and prepaid spend cards, providing credit commensurate with fuel usage and business revenue, free monthly reporting to Experian, and a fast application without a hard credit check.

Fleet managers can easily set spend limits (per transaction, daily, weekly), operational hours, category restrictions, out-of-network acceptance, and merchant restrictions directly from the Customer dashboard.
AtoB offers a variety of instant transfer methods (Venmo, PayPal, push to debit, Pay by email or text) for fleet managers to send funds to drivers 24/7/365 for a 1% fee.
AtoB is not a bank but maintains wallet accounts with an FDIC insured bank.
